LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.PlanDoors.De:
Place planning designations for doors.

Right click to choose from different shapes.

Hold {0} to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.PlanFloors.D:
Place planning designations for floors.

Right click to choose from different shapes.

Hold {0} to pick an already existing color.
Place planning designations for objects.

Right click to choose from different shapes.

Hold {0} to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.PlanWalls.De:
Place planning designations for walls.

Right click to choose from different shapes.

Hold {0} to pick an already existing color.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.CopyPlan.Des: Copy a plan of the selected area to the clipboard.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.CutPlan.Desc: Cut a plan of the selected area to the clipboard.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.PastePlan.De: Paste a plan from the clipboard to the map.\n\nUse keys to rotate and flip.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.RedoPlan.Des: Redo the last undo planning action.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.LoadPlan.Des:
Load a plan from a file.

Left click opens a dialog.

Right click to quickly select the last loaded plans.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.SavePlan.Des: Save the last copied plan to a file.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.TogglePlanVi: Toggle the visibility of all plans.\n\nHold {0} and click to toggle each plan type individually.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Designator.ChangePlanAp:
Left click to change the opacity.

Right click to change the texture set.

Hold {0} and click to change each plan type individually.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.PickColorFromPlan: Grab a color from an existing plan.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UndoRedo.Label: Undo-Redo
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UseUndoRedo.De: Determines whether to use the undo-redo system and whether the buttons are visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.DisplayCutDesi: Determines whether the cut plan designator button is visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.DisplayToggleP: Determines whether the toggle plan visibility designator button is visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.DisplayChangeP: Determines whether the change plan appearance designator button is visible.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.ArePlansPersis: Determines whether plans stay after a task has been finished on the same cell.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.UseCtrlForColo: Determines whether Ctrl has to be pressed to display the color dialog.
LanguageData.PlanningExtended.Settings.ArePlansVisibl: Determines whether plan designations are visible or not.
